column2: Do not change any other values or else there will probably be problems
For sequence coordinates, use SeqBuilder/APE numbering (starts at 1). Program corrects to Python numbering (starts at 0).
To get folder names, right-click on the address bar in Windows Explorer and select "Copy as Text"
2. Save this file as .csv  It will ask if you're okay with layout information being lost - say OK.
You can get the complete address for this file by going to the file tab and copying the address (line below the title)
Twist sequence file - leave blank if not Twist
Whole run including diversity sequence, use T not U, use all capital letters
Exclude any bases at the end? (e.g. because many truncated runs) - defaults to 0
Randomized bases expected to be paired - 5'
Randomized bases expected to be paired - 3'
General minimum Q score - defaults to 0
Allowed Q1 failures per non-randomized sequence - defaults to 0
Absolute Q floor (if allowed failures) - defaults to 0
Predicted errors based on Q score filtering
Max mismatches allowed - currently calculates to int(predicted+1) *2
How do you want the randomized sequences formatted?
Create a fuller stem sequence, e.g. for comparison to other libraries?
Use N to code for put library base here, d to code for drop library base, use U not T
